results.name: RATS: Reverse Add Then Sort the digits applied to previous term, starting with 29.
comment: A114616(1) = 29 is the smallest starting number for a RATS trajectory leading to a cycle of length 18: A114611(29) = 18;
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, RATS Sequence
